code: import React from'react';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import"./UsersItem.css";import Avatar from'../../shared/components/UIElements/Avatar';import Card from'../../shared/components/UIElements/Card';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var UsersItem=function UsersItem(props){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:"user-item",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card,{className:"user-item__content users-page",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Link,{to:"/".concat(props.id,"/activities"),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"user-item__image",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Avatar,{image:process.env.REACT_APP_ASSET_URL+"/".concat(props.image),alt:props.name})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"user-item__info",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:props.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h3",{children:[props.count," ",props.count===1?'Event':'Events']})]})]})})});};export default UsersItem;
